name: Topological Joint Rules
description: makes rules to apply joint types for each topology type.

inputParameters.name: L
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to L topology. Default type is L-Miter. Input is a joint options component.

inputParameters.name: T
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to T topology. Default type is T-Butt. Input is a joint options component.

inputParameters.name: X
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to X topology. Default type is X-HalfLap. Input is a joint options component.
